name: 210509-JJJJJ
description: Hommage to JJJJJohn's infamous Window Still Life serie. Was a great exercise to work on my own window/fishtank/biome/microworld serie. I v been focusing on rendering the very relaxing, subtle animations of the originals without going for a straight copie but using the exercise as a way to work on my personnal esthetical/ethical quest. Had a great time doin it, and took it quite seriously since I really like what mister Karel achieved in his own quest through the H=N windows serie
